Cypripedium acaule is a member of the orchid genus Cypripedium. Members of 
this genus are commonly referred to as lady's slipper orchids. First described in 
1789 by Scottish botanist William Aiton, C. acaule is commonly referred to as the 
pink lady's slipper, stemless lady's-slipper, or moccasin flower. ... pink lady's 
slipper is the provincial flower of Prince Edward Island, Canada.
